pkgmetadata.longdescription: Introduction------------This is like pexpect, but it will work with serial port that youpass it. You are reponsible for opening and close the serial port.This allows you to use Pexpect with Serial port which pyserial supports.Usage-----```pythonimport serialfrom pexpect_serial import SerialSpawnwith serial.Serial('COM1', 115200, timeout=0) as ser: ss = SerialSpawn(ser) ss.sendline('start') ss.expect('done')```License-------MIT
